categories.label: AI & LLM Tools
categories.description: Local and cloud-based AI models, LLM runners, and AI chat platforms for building private AI tools.

tools.name: Ollama
tools.description: Local LLM runner. Run AI models like Llama and Mistral on your own machine for private AI tools.

tools.name: Yupp.ai
tools.description: Compare multiple AI models side-by-side and earn rewards for providing feedback on AI responses.

tools.name: Uncensored.ai
tools.description: AI chat platform with minimal content filtering for unrestricted conversations and experimentation.

tools.name: Pomelli (Google Labs)
tools.description: AI marketing assistant that generates brand-based marketing content and copywriting.

tools.name: Kling
tools.description: Advanced AI text-to-video generator capable of creating cinematic-style videos from text prompts.

tools.name: Higgsfield
tools.description: AI video generation platform focused on creating realistic human visuals and character animations.

categories.label: AI / Video / Creative Assets
categories.description: Stock libraries, animation tools, and asset platforms for VFX, video, motion graphics, and creative projects.

tools.name: ProductionCrate
tools.description: Huge library of VFX, sound effects, 3D assets, and motion graphics templates for video production.

tools.name: Animagraffs
tools.description: Interactive 3D mechanical explainers for engineering visualization and product demonstrations.

tools.name: LottieFiles
tools.description: Library and editor for lightweight animated UI using Lottie JSON format animations.

tools.name: LottieFlow
tools.description: Free customizable Lottie animations. Perfect for Webflow, React, and web UI projects.

categories.label: Design & UI Inspiration
categories.description: Landing page galleries, layout templates, UI components, and inspiration platforms for design reference.

tools.name: Lapa Ninja
tools.description: Landing page inspiration gallery showcasing beautiful marketing sites and SaaS homepages.

tools.name: UI Layouts
tools.description: Modern dashboard and SaaS layout inspiration for building professional admin interfaces.

tools.name: Uiverse
tools.description: Open-source UI components library with copy-paste HTML/CSS/Tailwind code snippets.

tools.name: IconScout
tools.description: Icons, illustrations, 3D assets, and Lottie animations marketplace with millions of resources.

categories.label: Developer Tools & Utilities
categories.description: Essential development utilities for prototyping, testing, documentation, and browser compatibility checking.

tools.name: CodePen
tools.description: Online HTML/CSS/JS playground for creating, sharing, and collaborating on web projects.

tools.name: DevDocs
tools.description: Offline documentation browser for quick access to programming language and framework docs.

tools.name: Can I Use
tools.description: Browser compatibility checker for CSS features, JavaScript APIs, and web standards.

tools.name: Wave Terminal (Waveterm)
tools.description: AI-powered modern terminal emulator with advanced features and productivity enhancements.

categories.label: Frontend / Animation / 3D
categories.description: JavaScript libraries for 3D graphics, advanced animations, and interactive web components.

tools.name: Three.js
tools.description: JavaScript 3D library for creating interactive 3D web graphics and immersive experiences.

tools.name: ReactBits
tools.description: Library of animated and interactive React UI components with smooth transitions.

tools.name: React Tilt Button
tools.description: React component that adds 3D tilt hover effects to UI elements for interactive designs.

tools.name: CSS-Tricks
tools.description: Advanced CSS learning resource with tutorials, techniques, and best practices for modern CSS.

categories.label: Design Tools
categories.description: Professional design and prototyping tools for UI/UX design, mockups, and visual effects.

tools.name: Penpot
tools.description: Open-source UI/UX design and prototyping tool. Self-hosted Figma alternative.

tools.name: Mockey.ai
tools.description: AI mockup generator that creates product design previews automatically from descriptions.

tools.name: EndlessTools
tools.description: 3D and visual effect generator for creating stunning creative visuals and animations.

categories.label: Learning Platforms
categories.description: Practical education and training courses for AI, machine learning, and advanced development skills.

tools.name: fast.ai
tools.description: Practical deep learning course with hands-on AI training using modern tools and frameworks.
